title: Leaver buster
body: I know im gonna sound whiney and stuff i get the purpose of leaverbuster but i dc'd for like 10 minutes cus my modem was acting up and i rejoined (and we played for another 10 minutes after cus it was aram) and ive been placed in the low priority thing i dont leave games intentionally its only when i dc that it happens but i always rejoin is there any way to get rid of the low priority queue rather than having to keep waiting?

replies.body:
Similar thing happened to me!
I never leave games!
my PC blue screened, restarted and rejoined for a while but then it blue screened again! (fixed it now)

You should punish the players who leave FREQUENTLY not those have have the OCCASIONAL connection/PC issue!

and there really should be some kind of check to see if the player returned or if they attempted to return!

either way you want to **target the intentional leavers! not the players who try to do the right thing!** sometimes its unavoidable

If you take longer than five minutes to rejoin, you are considered to have left the game, even if you rejoin and play later on. It's terrible and in my opinion should be adjusted a bit.

What I suggest you do is find the cause of the reason as to why you are disconnecting, and don't play match-made games until you fix it. That is, of course, if you don't want any more penalties.

If you need any help with that, provide me with your OS and ISP.
